travel_class.description: Travel class can be 'First Class', 'Economy', 'Business' or 'Premium Economy'

travel_mode.description: Travel mode can be 'one way' or 'round trip'

waybill_type.description: this can be 'air only', 'road only' or 'air and road'

vehicle_make.description: vehicle make (like: Honda, Toyota, Smart), Required only when vehicle_type is 'personal car'

vehicle_type.description: Vehicle type can be 'personal car', 'light truck' or 'heavy-duty truck'

vehicle_year.description: vehicle year (like: 2010, 2015, 2019), Required only when vehicle_type is 'personal car'

vehicle_type.description: Vehicle type (like: private car, motorcycle,cargo van,zero-emission)
